summary: Mark quickfix & location list items with signs
name: quickfixsigns
description:
http://github.com/tomtom/quickfixsigns_vim

Mark intersting lines with signs:

    - items in the quickfix and location lists (e.g. compilation errors)
    - marks a-zA-Z
    - relative line numbers
    - changes (with respect to the version in the VCS)

Other lists can be configured via the |g:quickfixsigns_lists| variable.

The attached text is displayed in a balloon when hovering with the mouse 
over the sign.
install_details:
Requirements: has('signs')

Edit the vba file and type: >

    :so %

See :help vimball for details. If you have difficulties or use vim 7.0,
please make sure, you have the current version of vimball
(vimscript #1502) installed or update your runtime.
